item.title: Blacksmith (Level 4)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 3)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 2)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Presenter (Level 4)
item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show

item.title: Apprentice Archivist (Level 1)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Chimney Sweeper (Level 4)
item.description: Used git gc to run a number of housekeeping tasks on the current repository.

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 3)
item.description: Used git blame to annotates a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Historian (Level 4)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 3)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Apprentice Cleaning lady (Level 2)
item.description: Remove untracked files from the working tree with git clean

item.title: Apprentice Seamstress (Level 1)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Let there be light
item.description: Commit without a parent.

item.title: Apprentice Investigator (Level 2)
item.description: Used git blame to annotates a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Apprentice Blacksmith (Level 2)
item.description: Created a branch using git checkout -b.

item.title: Master Author (Level 7)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 7)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Banker (Level 5)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Stone Mason (Level 5)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.description: Shows one or more objects (blobs, trees, tags and commits) with git show
